resources.string: Your Gear has been reset. The Gear Manager application will close shortly.
To enable Remote connection on your Gear, sign in to your Galaxy account.

"Sign in to your Galaxy account to use the following features even when not connected via Bluetooth: - Receiving notifications - Using applications via Remote connection Using Remote connection may result in additional charges."
To enable Auto call forwarding, open the Gear application on your mobile device and enable Remote connection, then try again.
To enable Remote connection, update Galaxy account manually.
A network error occurred while signing in to your Galaxy account on your mobile device.
Connect to your Gear remotely, using Mobile data or Wi-Fi together with your Galaxy account.
